Num.FuncTxt:
local pc = GetSkillOwner(obj)
local abil = GetAbility(pc, 'Appraiser1')
local time = 40000
if abil ~= nil and abil.ActiveState == 1 then
time = time + (abil.Level * 1000)
end
return time;
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then return 900000 else return 60000 end
local obj = GetSkill(self, "Wugushi_ThrowGuPot") if obj ~= nil then return obj.Level end
local obj = GetSkill(self, "Wugushi_ThrowGuPot") if obj ~= nil then return obj.Level end

local buffTime = 5000 + obj.Level * 1000
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then
buffTime = buffTime * 0.5
end
return buffTime

local lifeTime = -200
if IsPVPServer(self) == 1 then
lifeTime = -200 * 2
end
return lifeTime;

Str.FuncTxt: local self = GetSkillOwner(obj); local abil = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Cleric10"); if abil > 0 then return "FRIEND" else return "ALL" end

Num.FuncTxt: local abil_lev = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, "Cleric5"); return 4000 + obj.Level*2000 + abil_lev*1000;

lifeTime =lifeTime *0.5
end
return lifeTime

addLifeTime = addLifeTime * 2
end
return -addLifeTime;

else

end

end

local owner = GetOwner(self); local skl = GetSkill(owner, 'Falconer_Aiming'); return skl.Level;

else

end

Str.FuncTxt: local abilLevel = GET_ABIL_LEVEL(self, 'Necromancer16'); if abilLevel > 0 then return 'HigherRotten_Debuff'; else return 'DirtyWall_Debuff'; end

applyCount = applyCount *0.5
end
return math.floor(applyCount)
